text: Giacomo Babini (22 February 1929 - 1 November 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic prelate. He was born in Verghereto, Italy. He became a priest in 1966. He was controversial for his antisemitism and homophobia comments.Pedofilia, attacco antisemita di monsignor Babini "Sui media in corso una campagna sionista" He was the Bishop of Pitigliano-Sovana-Orbetello (1991–1996) and Grosseto (1996–2001). Babini died on 1 November 2021 at a hospital in Arezzo, Italy at the age of 92.La diocesi in lutto per la scomparsa di Giacomo Babini, vescovo ausiliare di Arezzo ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
